name: Keet
headline: Authentication for AI Agents
description:
Keet provides authentication for AI agents. Developers use us to connect their customers accounts and perform actions on their behalf. 

Whether it be legacy software or consumer sites, Keet manages your users authenticated sessions and provides stable integrations on any web platform. Now your AI Agent can access healthcare data or send automated messages on LinkedIn via Keet’s API or SDK.

Backed by YCombinator
# Authentication for Agents
Integrate with any platform that requires authentication and does not have an API or is difficult to gain access to the API.
[Sign up for free ](https://trykeet.com/<https:/app.trykeet.com/auth/signup>)Get a custom integration
# Unlock the API you need
Keet lets you connect your customers accounts to APIs that are difficult to access and perform actions or extract data on their behalf.
# Integrate with platforms that dont offer APIs
Automate tough to access software and extract data on your customers behalf or migrate your customers data to your platform.
Legacy Software
Integrate with legacy platforms like CRMs, EHRs, POS systems. We have solutions spanning every vertical. Reach out to get access or request a custom integration.
Onboarding Automation
Migrate all your customers data from your competitors system. Get your customers records from any platform and use them to automate the onboarding process onto your service.
Consumer Platforms
Automate on familiar consumer platforms like LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram and more. Send messages, read messages or connect with people on consumer platforms.
How it works
# Connect accounts once and complete actions on your customers behalf
Automate the software that your agent needs to connect to.
Add the link
Add the link component to your platform
Connect
Your customer authenticates to the platform
Automate
Extract data or take actions on behalf of your customer
````
import{ useKeetLink }from"@keet-tech/react-keet-link"import{ useEffect, useState }from"react"
exportdefaultfunctionKeetLink(){const{ open, isReady }=useKeetLink({  linkToken:"ADD YOUR LINK TOKEN",onSuccess=(publicToken:string)=>{/* send a request to your backend to 
   exchange this for an account token */}})
return(<buttondisabled={!isReady}onClick={open}>   Open Link
</button>)}
exportdefaultKeetLink;
```
`
Features
# Make reliable integrations your agent's key advantage
No Chrome Extension
Chrome extensions are lame and we don't use them or require your end-user to install one.
Reverse Engineered Endpoints
We use the internal API for our integrations, so you can access the data you need without relying on Playwright automations that break.
Quick implementation
We offer a simple React component that you can copy/paste into your project, and get started linking your end-users accounts.
Stable Authentication
We build the infrastructure to keep you authenticated on the platforms you need to automate.
Data Privacy
We never store any end-user data and we never have access to you're customer's auth credentials.
Custom Integrations
We can build the authentication and API for any platform you need to automate or integrate with.
Actions
Use our SDKs to access your end-users accounts with our pre-built endpoints.
Send Connection Request
Send Message
Order Ride
[View more](https://trykeet.com/<https:/docs.trykeet.com>)
```
1importKeetClientfrom"@keet-tech/keet-node-client"2
3const keet =newKeetClient({4  apiKey:"YOUR_API_KEY",5  accountToken:"END_USER_ACCOUNT_TOKEN"6})7
8keet.integrations.linkedin.post("Hello LinkedIn!")9keet.integrations.amazonBusiness.getOrders()
```

# Frequently Asked Questions
We've got answers.
### What platforms do you support?
### What happens if I want a integration that Keet currently doesn't offer?
### What are private integrations?
### Can I use Keet to web scrape?
### What if I want to add functionality to an API Keet already supports?

generated_description:
### Keet Overview

**Company Name**: Keet  
**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: Not specified (team of 2)  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S24  
**Website**: [trykeet.com](https://trykeet.com)  
**Group Partner**: Diana Hu  
**Tags**: Artificial Intelligence, Developer Tools, B2B  

### Mission

Keet is on a mission to streamline **authentication for AI agents**. In a world where the ability to integrate various software easily is a game-changer, Keet provides the tools developers need to connect customer accounts, allowing AI agents to perform actions on behalf of the user.

### What Does Keet Do?

Keet started with a fundamental service—offering authentication for AI agents. Their platform enables developers to handle user authenticated sessions seamlessly across various software environments—be it legacy systems or popular consumer platforms. 

With Keet’s API or SDK, AI agents can access healthcare data, send messages on LinkedIn, or even interact with various consumer platforms like Facebook and Instagram. Essentially, Keet acts as a bridge, unlocking hard-to-access APIs and providing a unified interface for automation.

### Key Features

1. **No Chrome Extensions**: Keet doesn’t rely on cumbersome browser extensions, making the user experience smoother.
2. **Reverse Engineered Endpoints**: They leverage internal APIs to ensure reliable integrations without the fragility typically associated with automation tools.
3. **Quick Implementation**: The provided React components allow for rapid incorporation into existing projects.
4. **Stable Authentication**: Built-in infrastructure helps maintain authentication across necessary platforms without hassle.
5. **Data Privacy**: They prioritize user security by not storing end-user data or handling customer credentials.
6. **Custom Integrations**: If you need access to a platform Keet doesn’t currently support, they’re open to creating custom solutions.

### Use Cases

- **Legacy Software Integration**: Connect with older systems like CRMs and EHRs effortlessly.
- **Onboarding Automation**: Migrate user data from competitors to streamline the onboarding process for new customers.
- **Consumer Platform Automation**: Automate interactions on familiar platforms, enhancing user engagement without breaking a sweat.

### How It Works

To get started with Keet, developers can easily integrate their link component in their platform, allowing users to authenticate once. After that, actions and data extraction can happen smoothly in the background. This is beneficial for use cases where automation needs to happen behind the scenes, providing utility without user inconvenience.

### Conclusion

As AI and automation continue to gain traction, Keet positions itself as a critical player in simplifying and enhancing the authentication process for developers. Founded in 2024 and already part of Y Combinator, Keet's fresh approach to integrating with various platforms will likely resonate well as demand for seamless automation increases.

If you're interested in what Keet can do and want to give it a try, check out their [documentation](https://trykeet.com/docs), [pricing](https://trykeet.com/pricing), or sign up to get started [here](https://trykeet.com/app.trykeet.com/auth/signup).
